        public void initializePath(double maxVel,
                           double maxAccel,
                           double maxVelk)
        Initializes the path
        Parameters:
        maxVel - maximum robot velocity
        maxAccel - maximum robot acceleration
        maxVelk - maximum turning velocity (between 1-5)

        end - ending point

      • smooth

        public void smooth(double a,
                   double b,
                   double tolerance)
        Smooths the path using gradient descent
        Parameters:
        a - 1-b
        b - smoothing factor (higher = more smooth)
        tolerance - convergence tolerance amount (higher = less smoothing)
